text: Palaeoniscidae is an extinct family of ray-finned fish in the order Palaeonisciformes. The family includes the genus Palaeoniscum and possibly other early actinopterygian genera from the Paleozoic and Mesozoic. == Taxonomy == * Family †Palaeoniscidae Vogt, 1852 ** Genus [Atherstonia cairncrossi Broom, 1913; Amblypteruscapensis Broom, 1913; Broometta cairncrossi Chabakov, 1927] *** Species †Atherstonia minor Woodward, 1893 ** Genus ?†Cryphaeiolepis Traquair, 1881 ***
